data.text: NAME ACRONYM DESCRIPTION COUNTRY BDŽ Holding BDŽ The national train operating company for passenger and freight transport in Bulgaria. Bulgaria BLS BLS Swiss - partly private - rail company, operating different regional lines in passenger traffic and connecting mainly Italy with northern Europe in freight traffic. Switzerland Bulmarket Bulmarket Bulmarket DM Ltd is a freight railway undertaking founded in 1996. The company is based in Bulgaria. Bulgaria České Dráhy ČD ČD is the national railway company in Czech Republic providing transport services. Czech Republic Société Nationale des Chemins de Fer Luxembourgeois CFL CFL is the national railway company in Luxembourg, both providing transport services and managing rail infrastructure. Luxembourg CFL cargo CFL Cargo Rail freight operator based in Luxembourg. Luxembourg Calea Ferată din Moldova CFM Calea Ferată din Moldova, Partner of CER, is the Moldovan railway company. CFM operates both passenger and freight trains and manages the railway infrastructure in the Republic of Moldova. Moldova Compania Nationala de Cai Ferate CFR CFR is the Infrastructure manager in Romania. Romania Societatea Natională de Transport Feroviar de Călători CFR Călători CFR Calatori is the national train operating company for passenger transport in Romania. Romania Societatea Natională de Transport Feroviar de Marfă CFR MARFA CFR Marfa is the national freight train operating company in Romania. Romania Comboios de Portugal CP CP is the national rail transport company in Portugal. Portugal Deutsche Bahn DB DB AG is the national railway company in Germany, both providing transport services and managing rail infrastructure. Germany Danske Statsbaner DSB DSB is the national rail transport company in Denmark. Denmark Eurail B.V. Eurail Eurail, partner of CER, is the organisation dedicated to the marketing and management of Eurail and Interrail products. Netherlands EUROFIMA EUROFIMA The European Company for the Financing of Railroad Rolling Stock is a supranational organisation supporting its shareholder railways as well as other railway bodies in renewing and modernising their equipment. Switzerland Eurostar Eurostar International passenger rail company connecting France, Belgium, the Netherlands, Germany, and the UK on high-speed direct and indirect routes. United Kingdom Euskotren Euskotren Euskotren is the Basque rail freight and passenger operator. Spain Eesti Raudtee EVR EVR is managing the Estonian rail infrastructure Estonia FNM Group FNM FNM is the leading integrated sustainable mobility group in the Lombardy Region. It is the first organisation in Italy to combine railway transport services and rail management infrastructure with road transport and motorway infrastructure management. Italy Ferrovie dello Stato Italiane FS Italiane FS SpA is the national railway company in Italy, both providing transport services and managing rail infrastructure. Italy Georgian Railway GR JSC Georgian Railway, partner of CER, is the national railway undertaking in Georgia, providing transport services and managing rail infrastructure. Georgia Györ-Sopron-Ebenfurti Vasút/Raab-Oedenburg-Ebenfurter Eisenbahn GySEV/Raaberbahn GySEV/Raaberbahn is a Hungarian/Austrian railway company operating lines between Györ - Sopron and Ebenfurti. Hungary HELLENIC TRAIN HELLENIC TRAIN Greek passenger and freight railway undertaking. Greece Hit Rail Hit Rail Hit Rail, partner of CER since 2023, is a private not-for-profit company providing the European railway sector with commonly defined, collaborative & innovative IT solutions and secure connectivity. Netherlands HUNGRAIL HUNGRAIL The Hungarian Railway Association was established in 2006 with the aim to coordinate national and international activities of its 17 member railway companies, both private and state owned. Hungary Hrvatske Željeznice Infrastructure HŽ Infrastructure HŽ is the Croatian national railway. Croatia Hrvatske Željeznice Passenger HŽ Passenger HŽ is the Croatian national railway. Croatia Iarnród Éireann IÉ IÉ is the national railway company in Ireland, both providing transport services and managing rail infrastructure. Ireland Israel Railways ISR Israel Railways corporation Ltd., partner of CER since 2017, is the state-owned principal railway company responsible for all inter-city, commuter, and freight rail transport in Israel. Israel Latvijas Dzelzceļš LDZ The state joint-stock company LDZ is the largest railway in the Baltic countries. Latvia Lietuvos Geležinkeliai LTG Lietuvos Geležinkeliai is the largest railway group in the Baltic States, comprising passenger transportation, freight and infrastructure companies. Lithuania Magyar Államvasutak MÁV MÁV is the national railway company in Hungary, both providing transport services and managing rail infrastructure. Hungary Montecargo Montecargo Montecargo is a railway undertaking based in Montenegro which provides rail freight. Montenegro Mitsui Rail Capital Europe MRCE MRCE is a locomotive leasing company offering its services Europe wide. Netherlands Nacionalna Kompania Železopatna Infrastruktura NRIC NRIC is the Bulgarian national rail infrastructure company. Bulgaria Nederlandse Spoorwegen NS NS is the national railway company in The Netherlands, providing transport services. Netherlands ÖBB-Holding ÖBB ÖBB is the national railway company in Austria, both providing transport services and managing rail infrastructure. Austria Organismós Sidirodrómon Elládos OSE OSE is the national rail infrastructure manager in Greece. Greece Piraeus Europe Asia Rail Logistics S.M.S.A. PEARL PEARL's main purpose is to provide rail logistics support and other freight forwarding services from and to Piraeus and other Greek Ports. Greece Polskie Koleje Państwowe PKP PKP is the national railway company in Poland, both providing transport services and managing rail infrastructure. Poland Rail Baltica RB Rail RB Rail AS is the joint venture developing the Rail Baltica infrastructure project. Latvia Rail Delivery Group RDG RDG brings together all passenger and freight operators in the UK with Network Rail and HS2, providing services and support to groups of members. United Kingdom Renfe Operadora Renfe RENFE Operadora is the national railway company in Spain providing transport services. Spain Schweizerische Bundesbahnen / Chemins de Fer Fédéraux Suisses / Ferrovie Federali Svizzere SBB SBB is the national railway company in Switzerland, both providing transport services and managing rail infrastructure Switzerland Société Nationale des Chemins de Fer Belges/Nationale Maatschappij der Belgische Spoorwegen SNCB/NMBS BELGIUM National railway undertaking in Belgium, providing both passenger and freight services. Belgium Société Nationale des Chemins de Fer Français SNCF SNCF is the national railway company in France, providing both transport services and managing rail infrastructure. France Slovenske Železnice SŽ SŽ is the national railway company in Slovenia, both providing transport services and managing rail infrastructure. Slovenia Správa Železnic SŽCZ SŽCZ is the infrastructure manager in the Czech Republic Czech Republic Tågföretagen ASTOC Tågföretagen is the trade and employers' association formed through a merger of the Association of Swedish Train Operating Companies (ASTOC) and the rail transport companies within Almega. Sweden Schweizerische Trassenvergabestelle TVS Swiss capacity allocation body (successor of Trasse Schweiz). Switzerland JSC “Ukrainian Railways” UZ JSC “Ukrainian Railways”, partner of CER, is the national railway of Ukraine. Ukraine Verband Deutscher Verkehrsunternehmen VDV VDV is the organisation for Germany’s public transport companies and rail freight transport companies. Germany VPE Rail Capacity Allocation Nonprofit Ltd. VPE VPE is the Hungarian Railway Capacity Allocator. Hungary VR-Yhtymä Oy VR Group VR Group is the leading rail operator in Finland providing travel, logistics and infrastructure engineering service. Finland Železnici na Republika Severna Makedonija Transport ŽRSM-Transport Railways of the Republic of North Macedonia Transport JSC Skopje is the country's freight and passenger railway operator. North Macedonia Infrastruktura Železnica Srbije ŽS Infrastructure Infrastructure of Serbian Railways JSC is the manager of the rail infrastructure of Serbia. Serbia Srbija Voz SV Passenger operator of Serbia. Serbia Železnice Slovenskej Republiky ŽSR ŽSR is the rail infrastructure manager in Slovakia. Slovakia Železničná Spoločnosť Slovensko ŽSSK ZSSK is the national rail passenger operator in Slovakia. Slovakia
